ygData.subject: The first time to group blues.
ygData.msgSnippet: Folks I need some tips. I grouped for the first time ever in the camp in the Northern end of Paludal Caverns. I had no idea what to do so I kept everybody
ygData.messageBody:
Folks I need some tips. I grouped for the first time ever in the
camp in the Northern end of Paludal Caverns. I had no idea what to
do so I kept everybody healed. My character is a level 23 shaman.

Then I was told that I should be giving everybody dex buffs instead.
So I did. I told everyone that to tell me when they needed more
buffing. Then, after a while, I was told about something called a
gropu channel and that I ought to click "say".

Note that I gathered that while watching text scroll up and off my
screen faster than I could read it. Everytime that a mob bealched, I
got a line of text. Things were very lively.

I'm level 24 now. I figured out that right clicking the dialog bar
will pull a box that will let me filter out everything but group
chat using group-say.

How is a shaman important to a group? What does the group need most
from the shaman? What is a shaman expected to know?

My character is Gunli on the Luclin server.
